data.title: Mike Denby on LinkedIn: #investment #economy #growth
data.meta_description:
LEICESTERSHIRE’s ECONOMY TO GROW TO £30bn BY 2030.



That’s the ambition and all will be discussed at the East Midlands Insider’s Leicester Economic…
data.text:
LEICESTER & LEICESTERSHIRE TOURISM VALUE HITS £2.4bn - A 15.5% INCREASE on the previous year. This is testament to the amazing attractions, events, cultural facilities, sporting heritage and hospitality venues in our region. It also highlights the commitment of our private sector partners and every local authority in the county, driving promotional activity in the sector. We are proud that Visit Leicester is the Visit England Local Visitor Economy Partnership for Leicester and Leicestershire, representing such as strong and vibrant sector. For the full story and to hear from Leicester City Mayor Peter Soulsby and Leicestershire County Council acting leader, Deborah Taylor - Click below https://lnkd.in/gFKNM2fP Leicester City Council Leicestershire County Council Hinckley and Bosworth Borough Council North West Leicestershire District Council Oadby & Wigston Borough Council Melton Borough Council Blaby District Council Harborough District Council Charnwood Borough Council Erika Hardy

There's less than a month left to nominate yourselves for the prestigious East Midlands Bricks Awards 2024. The awards are a fantastic opportunity to showcase your company's excellence and innovation. Invest in Leicester is proud to support the event and encourages all our partners and businesses to enter. The East Midlands Bricks Awards are a major event in the region's business calendar, recognising the top talent in the property and construction industry. The glittering ceremony will be held on Thursday, October 3rd at the Trent Bridge Cricket Ground. Nominations are now open! Don't miss this chance to be recognised for your achievements. Submit your entries by the deadline of Thursday, September 5th. Click here for more information and to enter: https://lnkd.in/eQp8q7kB East Midlands Business Link #Investment Invest in Leicester

I can’t rate this local authority any higher. A great leadership team with big ambitions. Melton Borough Council is in search of a Director for Place and Prosperity. Melton Borough Council is known "punching above its weight" and has a new and ambitious corporate strategy based on a clear mission: Helping People – Shaping Places. The Local Plan is delivering hundreds of new homes annually, and construction of a game-changing relief road is underway. In recent years, the council has also secured significant funding to allow regeneration of Melton Mowbray town centre, building upon its reputation as the Rural Capital of Food, and supporting sustainable growth across the borough. The new Director for Place and Prosperity will work with council members, partners, and the senior leadership team to bring fresh momentum to the council, delivering the many exciting projects in the pipeline and driving forward long-term strategic growth ambitions. Candidates will need a significant track record of success in delivering growth and development projects, securing funding streams, building strong and productive partnerships, and place shaping to ensure Melton's place and communities can thrive. An understanding of the particular challenges and opportunities facing a rural authority like Melton would also be highly desirable. Closing date: September 1, 2024 (formatted for US date style) For more information, please visit: https://lnkd.in/eeJcUsUE Invest in Leicester #Growth #Place

PRE LETS AGREED with Kazzoo Ltd, Somerbys IT Limited, and The VoIP Shop Brand New, net carbon zero workspace available from September. Located near Space Park and the National Space Centre and Space Park Leicester these units are ideal for high-tech and innovative businesses in #Leicester and #Leicestershire Units up to 2,170 sq. ft and can be combined to make larger units Contact Pankaj Mistry for more information or to arrange a viewing! #Leicester #IndustrialSpace #SpaceBusiness #Business #Investment Leicester City Council Leicestershire County Council
